/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and towering buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. People can be seen strolling along the sidewalk, adding a touch of life to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a beautiful backdrop to the scene. The image is captured in 360 degrees, offering a comprehensive view of the street and its surroundings.
